title: When you look at the top voted counter tip against Bard in LOL counter:

replies.body:
The tip is: "Don't ban bard so the enemy team can pick him and you can collect your free win"

http://lolcounter.com/champions/bard
Bard mains would probably maul people over and over again since they know what they're doing.
https://media.giphy.com/media/pcfdfm6hjTvji/giphy.gif
"Disregard Bard, Acquire Elo"

They just aren't on our level.

We'll show them.

We'll show them ALL!!!
 {{champion:432}} {{item:3094}} {{item:3285}}

vvvvv{{item:3115}} {{item:3115}} {{item:3115}} {{champion:432}} {{item:3115}} {{item:3115}} {{item:3115}} vvvvv


http://38.media.tumblr.com/f1ed931f99db1577e8538b16c2e4a2f0/tumblr_mvvxks0IJO1qg3z8zo1_400.gif

Get 100 meeps, click on Vayne once.
Yes, you did just one-shot her.
I thought I had a patent on that build...
{{champion:421}} 's top point is "If you kill her, she will die"
Kennen's top one is to choose ground type pokemon xD

Bard's strong against 
{{champion:6}} Jungler
{{champion:83}} General

Bard goes Even With
{{champion:6}} Top

http://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmedia.giphy.com%2Fmedia%2FDCp4s7Z1FizZe%2Fgiphy.gif&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=425
http://media.techeblog.com/images/going_to_hate.jpg

The first 10 or so games of Bard you do nothing but feed.. but then you start to improve. You really have to be patient to learn to play him. 
I have stopped the feeding now its all about working out how to have an impact on the game.
practice practice practice {{champion:432}} 

(obviously not in ranked)

Can we take a moment to read Udyr's top counter tip:
http://www.lolcounter.com/champions/udyr

"Tahm Kench is a water type pokemon, so electric attacks (Kennen, Xerath) are supereffective!"

WoW

... then you realise Illaoi has the whole website againts her, not only the comment section.
http://i.imgur.com/oA2RNLI.png
She isn't that ugly ...

http://lolcounter.com/champions/illaoi
She's channeling her inner spirit animal.
["Throw salt at him, this will demoralize him and make him all dried up"](http://www.lolcounter.com/champions/fizz) {{champion:105}} {{item:3070}}

On an unrelated note, some thing seems a bit off when I looked at Illaoi on that site:

http://i1042.photobucket.com/albums/b430/bluemoonwolf8/Capture_zpsuhxvifoi.jpg

I liked the old tip to fight against Malzahar:
"Just survive his combo and he's helpless." <--- Or something like that
why what is it?
Don't ban bard so the enemy team can pick him and you can collect your free win
Urgot.  Specifically jungle Urgot
